name: Notion Fitness Tracker

Whether you're a seasoned gym-goer or just starting out, this template is designed to help you stay on track with your fitness goals.With the Fitness Tracker, you can easily log your workouts, create new routines tailored to your specific needs, and plan your meal schedule.
